<title level="1" right="Rules">[Other Martial Class](/Rules.aspx?ID=1352)</title>

**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 195

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An apprentice of another martial class ([barbarian](/Classes.aspx?ID=2), [champion](/Classes.aspx?ID=4), [fighter](/Classes.aspx?ID=7), [ranger](/Classes.aspx?ID=9), or [rogue](/Classes.aspx?ID=10)) is trained in light armor, all simple weapons, and one martial weapon listed in the class’s initial proficiencies. If a martial class not listed here lacks light armor or martial weapon training (as the monk does), give it a different ability as well.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
